item.description:
The Dance of Intimacy, in-to-me-you-see, is an often stated reminder that intimacy involves seeing and being seen, hearing and being heard. In this class, we'll integrate principles of intimate communication--with a deep(er) level of transparency and authenticity.  With consensual touch, emotional intimacy, and our love of movement we uncover and magnify love and compassion for ourselves which we can then manifest within our lives, partners, families, and community. The sky is not the limit!  This workshop is open to singles, couples, any gender preference and orientation.

Wear comfortable clothing. Bring a water bottle.
Come with your curiosity, playfulness, and an open heart.
Please note this is not a dance class but will include movement, yoga, and meditation.  You may wish to bring a journal.

**  Please note that this class I am teaching on Saturday, April 27th from 5-6:45 pm is open and available to anyone who wants to come!  There are also other amazing things happening all weekend long!  Here's just a sample of things you can come to:
Come for just the dances, a single workshop or the whole weekend.

For class descriptions, rates, and to register online, go to dancefriday.org/weekend

Register by April 12 and save! (RSVPing to this event is not registering! Make sure you register - and pay - online!)


Friday, April 26th (evening)
Dance Friday - A DJ'd Barefoot Boogie! 
8:45 pm - Midnight 

Saturday, April 27th
1:00 pm - 2:45 pm 
Chapel: Massage Jam - Jessica Lupien
Barn Room: Journey Dance - Suzy Spivey

3:00 pm - 4:45 pm

5:00 pm - 6:45 pm

8:30 pm - 9:45 pm - Music and Movement with David Hero & Albino Mbie
10:00 pm - 12 Midnight -- A DJ'd Barefoot Boogie  

Sunday, April 28th - And there's more!
item.name: The Dance of Intimacy -- As part of Dance New England's Spring Weekend!
